entry.tran: 女装设计师;女装裁缝;女装商人
entry.def: A couturier is a person who designs, makes, and sells expensive, fashionable clothes for women.

example.ex: The Paris couturiers showed their collections for winter last week.
example.tran: 上周，巴黎的时装设计师们展示了他们的冬季时装作品。

auth_sentence.content: Chanel, an ego-monster without match, called Balenciaga the only couturier, while Dior judged him the master of us all.
